index.title: Settings
index.body: Change the settings for the currently opened database.

categories.title: Categories
categories.description: Here you can manage your categories. You can use categories to categorize project groups.

links.title: Links
links.description: Here you can specify custom links for different use cases.

projectLinks.title: Project links
projectLinks.description: Custom links defined here are related to a single project. The primary link will be displayed separately next to the "..." menu. Use "{projectNumber}" to use the project number in your URL.

deleteDialog.title: Delete primary project link?
deleteDialog.body: Do you want to delete the primary project link?
